sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.TimecardUsageAnalytics</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>TimecardUsageAnalytics</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var TimecardUsageAnalytics = Class.create();
TimecardUsageAnalytics.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	workerPortalLaunch: function(tasksCount) {
		var data = {};
		data['event.type'] = 'worker.portal.launch';
		data['tasks.count'] = tasksCount;
		this.logAnalytics(data);
	},
	
	tcpImpersonation: function() {
		var data = {};
		data['event.type'] = 'time.sheet.portal.impersonation';
		this.logAnalytics(data);
	},
	
	reportActionUsage: function(action, mode){
		var data = {};
		data['event.type'] = 'ui.actions';
		data.action = action;
		data.mode = mode;
		this.logAnalytics(data);
	},
	
	logAnalytics: function(data) {
		if(AnalyticsFramework.isDisabled())
			return;
		
		var streamId = "snc.pps.time_card_management";
		var obfuscationList = [];
		data["app.name"] = "time_card_management";
		status = AnalyticsFramework.open(streamId);
		if (status === 0) {
			status = AnalyticsFramework.sendJSON(streamId, obfuscationList, JSON.stringify(data));
			status = AnalyticsFramework.close(streamId);
		}
	},

    type: 'TimecardUsageAnalytics'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2017-02-27 06:07:38</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>08c2df3793013200ea933007f67ffb09</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>TimecardUsageAnalytics</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Time Card Management" source="com.snc.time_card">3bef86e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d4343</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_08c2df3793013200ea933007f67ffb09</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2018-03-08 12:54:26</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
